Recipe: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Oil a 9x13 pan.
Whisk together 3/4c. Sugar, 1/2c. Apple Cider Vinegar, 1/4c. Ketchup, 1Tbsp Soy Sauce and 1/2Tsp. Garlic Powder for the sauce.
Season the chicken with salt and peper. Add the cornstarch and mix until chicken is coated.
Dip chicken in egg and cook in a pan with oil until golden brown, about 2 minutes.
Let chicken sit on a paper towel to remove excess oil.
Combine cooked chicken and sauce in 9x13 pan.
Bake for about 55 minutes, mixing every 15 minutes.
